settings.code:
AT-HOME FITNESS REIMAGINED

CIRCOLO SMART FITNESS MIRROR

Transform your home into a fitness studio. Create the workout of your choice with whomever you want whenever you want with access to Zoom classes, YouTube content and a library of on-demand exercises. Advanced technology will level up your workout and keep you going.

SHOP CIRCOLO

ANY CONTENT, ANY TIME

With Circolo, you can access any pre-loaded workout video right from the Mirror, or import any Youtube content and follow along.

WORK OUT TOGETHER

With Circolo's virtual group workouts, you can join your friends in the same workout and see each other's progress or invite them to any workout you choose, all from the comfort of your home.

ACCESS ANY ZOOM CLASSES

Already training on Zoom? Circolo is integrated with Zoom, so you can join any workout sessions (and meetings too!) on our Mirror. Now you can finally see everyone else and your form with our reflective Mirror.

settings.title: WORK OUT TOGETHER
settings.text: With Circolo's virtual group workouts, you can join your friends in the same workout and see each other's progress or invite them to any workout you choose, all from the comfort of your home.

settings.title: ACCESS ANY ZOOM CLASSES
settings.text: Already training on Zoom? Circolo is integrated with Zoom, so you can join any workout sessions (and meetings too!) on our Mirror. Now you can finally see everyone else and your form with our reflective Mirror.

settings.code:
DESIGN YOUR WORKOUT

With Circolo Smart Workout™, you get a brand new strength or cardio workout every time you show up to the Mirror. No two workouts will ever be the same. With over 80,000 different configurations, Circolo gives you the power to build a training routine you love!

I have 20 minutes,

I want a Strength workout focus on Core.

I have Dumbbells and today I want to Challenge myself.

settings.title: 32” FULL HD 1080P TOUCH SCREEN DISPLAY
settings.text: Train with confidence with our integrated touch screen display. Select a program and follow along. Our crystal-clear reflection allow you to follow the instructor while also seeing your form.

settings.title: 2 FRONT-FACING CAMERA  FOR MOTION CAPTURE
settings.text: Train with instant feedback. Turn on your camera for your personal trainer or Circolo’s proprietary AI algorithm to monior your form and provides real-time feedback on movement quality.

settings.title: HIGH-FIDELITY SPEAKERS & ECHO CANCELLING MICROPHONE
settings.text: Sweat to the beat of your favorite music on Youtube. Our echo cancelling microphone also allow you to chat with your friends or personal trainer during a live session.

settings.code:
ELEVATE YOUR EXPERIENCE WITH CIRCOLO MOBILE APP

Every effort counts. Circolo tracks your overall progress by muscle and body part, so you know exactly where you stand and how you can continue progress.

The Circolo mobile app is your ultimate training tool. Use it to access your progress stats and streaks. Explore, plan, and create new workouts–all on the go.

settings.title: EXPERIENCE CIRCOLO RISK FREE FOR 30 DAYS
